00154     public function copyFiles( $arFileList = array() )
00155     {
00156         $_bOverwriteAll = false;
00157 
00158         echo "Results" . PHP_EOL;
00159         echo "============================================================" . PHP_EOL;
00160         
00161         foreach ( $arFileList as $_name => $_arFile )
00162         {
00163             $_sSource = strtr( $_arFile['source'], '/\\', DIRECTORY_SEPARATOR );
00164             $_sTarget = strtr( $_arFile['target'], '/\\', DIRECTORY_SEPARATOR );
00165             $_oCallback = $_arFile['callback'];
00166             $_arParams = $_arFile['params'];
00167             $_sContent = null;
00168 
00169             $this->ensureDirectory( $_sTarget );
00170 
00171             //  Get the content...
00172             if ( $_oCallback && is_array( $_oCallback ) )
00173                 $_sContent = call_user_func( $_oCallback, $_sSource, $_arParams );
00174             else
00175                 $_sContent = file_get_contents( $_sSource );
00176 
00177             ob_flush();
00178 
00179             if ( is_file( $_sTarget ) )
00180             {
00181                 if ( ! $this->force && $_sContent === file_get_contents( $_sTarget ) )
00182                 {
00183                     $arFileList[ $_name ][ '_status' ] = 0;
00184                     $this->boldEchoString( $_name, 'Unchanged' );
00185                     continue;
00186                 }
00187                 
00188                 if ( $this->force || $_bOverwriteAll )
00189                 {
00190                     $arFileList[ $_name ][ '_status' ] = 1;
00191                     $this->boldEchoString( $_name, ( $this->force ? 'Force ' : '' ) . 'Overwrite' );
00192                 }
00193                 else
00194                 {
00195                     $this->boldEchoString( $_name, 'Existing' );
00196                     $this->echoString( "[\033[1my\033[0mes|\033[1mn\033[0mo|\033[1ma\033[0mll|\033[1mq\033[0muit] ", '--> Overwrite? ', false, ' ', false, 8 );
00197                     
00198                     switch ( substr( strtolower( trim( fgets( STDIN ) ) ), 0, 1 ) )
00199                     {
00200                         case 'q':
00201                             return;
00202                             
00203                         case 'a':
00204                             $_bOverwriteAll = true;
00205 
00206                         case 'y':
00207                             $arFileList[ $_name ][ '_status' ] = 1;
00208                             $this->boldEchoString( $_name, 'Overwriting' );
00209                             break;
00210                         
00211                         case 'n':
00212                             $arFileList[ $_name ][ '_status' ] = 0;
00213                             $this->boldEchoString( $_name, 'Skipping' );
00214                             break;
00215                     }
00216                 }
00217             }
00218             else
00219             {
00220                 $arFileList[ $_name ][ '_status' ] = 1;
00221                 $this->ensureDirectory( dirname( $_sTarget ) );
00222                 $this->boldEchoString( $_name, 'Generating' );
00223             }
00224             
00225             @file_put_contents( $_sTarget, $_sContent );
00226         }
00227         
00228         //  Return array with statuses
00229         return $arFileList;
00230     }

00238     public function pluralize( $sString )
00239     {
00240         $_arRules = array(
00241             '/(x|ch|ss|sh|us|as|is|os)$/i' => '\1es',
00242             '/(?:([^f])fe|([lr])f)$/i' => '\1\2ves',
00243             '/(m)an$/i' => '\1en',
00244             '/(child)$/i' => '\1ren',
00245             '/(r|t|b|d)y$/i' => '\1ies',
00246             '/s$/' => 's',
00247         );
00248         
00249         //  Check our pattern list
00250         foreach ( $_arRules as $_sRule => $_sReplace )
00251             if ( preg_match( $_sRule, $sString ) ) return preg_replace( $_sRule, $_sReplace, $sString );
00252         
00253         return $sString . 's';
00254     }

00268     public function buildFileList( $sSourceDir, $sTargetDir, $sBaseDir = '' )
00269     {
00270         $_arList = array();
00271         $_iDir = opendir( $sSourceDir );
00272 
00273         while ( $_sFile = readdir( $_iDir ) )
00274         {
00275             //  Ignore parents and svn...
00276             if ( $_sFile === '.' || $_sFile === '..' || $_sFile === '.svn' )
00277                 continue;
00278 
00279             $_sSourcePath = $sSourceDir . DIRECTORY_SEPARATOR . $_sFile;
00280             $_sTargetPath = $sTargetDir . DIRECTORY_SEPARATOR . $_sFile;
00281             $_name = $sBaseDir === '' ? $_sFile : $sBaseDir . DIRECTORY_SEPARATOR . $_sFile;
00282 
00283             if ( is_dir( $_sSourcePath ) ) 
00284                 $_arList = array_merge( $_arList, $this->buildFileList( $_sSourcePath, $_sTargetPath, $_name ) );
00285             else                                      
00286             {
00287                 $_arList[ $_name ] = array(
00288                     'source' => $_sSourcePath,
00289                     'target' => $_sTargetPath,
00290                     'callback' => array( $this, 'generateFile' ),
00291                     'params' => array(),
00292                 );
00293             }
00294         }
00295         
00296         closedir( $_iDir );
00297 
00298         return $_arList;
00299     }

00307     public function ensureDirectory( $sTarget )
00308     {
00309         $_bResult = true;
00310         $_arInfo = pathinfo( $sTarget );
00311         
00312         if ( ! is_dir( $_arInfo['dirname'] ) )
00313         {
00314             $this->boldEchoString( strtr( $_arInfo['dirname'], '\\', '/' ), 'Created Directory' );
00315             $_bResult = @mkdir( $_arInfo['dirname'] );
00316         }
00317         
00318         return $_bResult;
00319     }

00343     {
00344         if ( is_array( $oData ) ) 
00345             extract( $oData, EXTR_PREFIX_SAME, 'data' );
00346         else
00347             $data = $oData;
00348             
00349         if ( $bReturn )
00350         {
00351             ob_start();
00352             ob_implicit_flush( false );
00353             require( $sViewFile );
00354             return ob_get_clean();
00355         }
00356 
00357         require( $sViewFile );
00358     }

00370     public function echoString( $sStr, $sLabel = null, $bReturnValue = false, $sSuffix = ' : ', $bNewLine = true, $iExtraSpace = 0, $bBold = false )
00371     {
00372         $_sVal = null;
00373         
00374         if ( $sLabel == ' ' )
00375             $sSuffix = null;
00376         else
00377             $sLabel = trim( $sLabel );
00378 
00379         if ( null !== $sLabel ) 
00380         {
00381             if ( strlen( $sLabel ) > $this->colWidth ) $this->colWidth = strlen( $sLabel );
00382             $_sVal = str_pad( $sLabel . $sSuffix, $this->colWidth + self::COL_PADDING + $iExtraSpace, ' ', STR_PAD_LEFT );
00383         }
00384 
00385         $_sVal .= ( is_object( $sStr ) ? get_class( $sStr ) : $sStr ) . ( $bNewLine ?  PHP_EOL : '' );
00386         
00387         if ( $bBold ) $_sVal = str_replace( $sLabel, $this->bold( $sLabel ), $_sVal );
00388 
00389         if ( $bReturnValue ) return $_sVal;
00390         
00391         //  Otherwise echo!
00392         echo $_sVal;
00393     }

00427     public function getopts( $arArgs = array() )
00428     {
00429         $_arResults = array(
00430             'original' => $arArgs,
00431             'rebuilt' => array(),
00432             'options' => array(),
00433         );
00434         
00435         //  Our return options array...
00436         $_arOptions = array();
00437         
00438         //  Rebuild args...
00439         for ( $_i = 0, $_iCount = count( $arArgs ); $_i < $_iCount; $_i++ )
00440         {
00441             $_sArg = $arArgs[ $_i ];
00442             $_sOpt = trim( substr( $_sArg, 0, strpos( $_sArg, '=' ) ) );
00443 
00444             if ( $_sOpt && $_sOpt[0] == '-' && $_sOpt[1] == '-' )
00445                 $_arOptions[ substr( $_sOpt, 2 ) ] = str_replace( $_sOpt . '=', '', $_sArg );
00446             elseif ( $_sOpt && $_sOpt[0] == '-' )
00447                 $_arOptions[ substr( $_sOpt, 1 ) ] = str_replace( $_sOpt . '=', '', $_sArg );
00448             else
00449                 $_arResults['rebuilt'][] = $arArgs[ $_i ];
00450         }
00451         
00452         $_arResults['options'] = $_arOptions;
00453         
00454         //  Return the processed results...
00455         return $_arResults;     
00456     }

00462     public function getDbConnection()
00463     {
00464         $_oDB = ( $this->databaseName != 'db' ) ? Yii::app()->{$this->databaseName} : Yii::app()->getDb();
00465 
00466         if ( $_oDB === null )
00467         {
00468             echo "\033[1mError\033[0m: an active '{$this->databaseName}' connection is required." . PHP_EOL;
00469             echo "If you already added '{$this->databaseName}' component in application configuration," . PHP_EOL;
00470             echo "please quit and re-run your command." . PHP_EOL;
00471             return false;
00472         }
00473 
00474         $_oDB->active = true;
00475         $this->schema = $_oDB->schema;
00476         
00477         return true;
00478     }

00490     protected function loadModule( $sClassName )
00491     {
00492         $_oModule = Yii::app();
00493         $_sModelClass = $sClassName;
00494         
00495         if ( false === ( $_iPos = strpos( $_sModelClass, '.' ) ) )
00496             $_sModelClass = 'application.models.' . $_sModelClass;
00497         else
00498         {
00499             $_sId = substr( $_sModelClass, 0, $_iPos );
00500             
00501             if ( null !== ( $_oNewModule = Yii::app()->getModule( $_sId ) ) )
00502                 $_oModule = $_oNewModule;
00503         }
00504         
00505         //  Return module
00506         return $_oModule;
00507     }

00515     protected function processArguments( $arArgs )
00516     {
00517         //  Set some defaults...
00518         $this->templatePath = PS::nvl( $this->templatePath, YII_PATH . '/cli/views/shell/model' );
00519 
00520         //  Process command line arguments
00521         $_sClassName = array_shift( $arArgs );
00522         $_arOptions = $this->getopts( $arArgs );
00523         $arArgs = array_merge( array( $_sClassName ), $_arOptions['rebuilt'] );
00524 
00525         //  Set our values based on options...
00526         foreach ( $_arOptions['options'] as $_sKey => $_sValue )
00527         {
00528             switch ( strtolower( $_sKey ) )
00529             {
00530                 case 'n':
00531                 case 'template-name':
00532                     $this->templateName = $_sValue;
00533                     break;
00534                     
00535                 case 'force':
00536                 case 'f':
00537                     $this->force = true;
00538                     break;
00539                     
00540                 case 'd':
00541                 case 'database':
00542                     $this->databaseName = $_sValue;
00543                     break;
00544                     
00545                 case 'b':
00546                 case 'base-class':
00547                     $this->baseClass = $_sValue;
00548                     break;
00549                     
00550                 case 't':
00551                 case 'template-path':
00552                     $this->templatePath = $_sValue;
00553                     break;
00554                     
00555                 default:
00556                     //  Look through options..
00557                     foreach ( $this->makeOptions( true, PS::OF_ASSOC_ARRAY, true ) as $_sOptKey => $_sOptValue )
00558                     {
00559                         if ( $_sKey == $_sOptKey || $_sKey == CPSTransform::underscorize( $_sOptKey, '-' ) )
00560                         {
00561                             $this->{$_sOptKey} = $_sValue;
00562                             break;
00563                         }
00564                     }
00565                     break;
00566             }
00567         }
00568         
00569         return $arArgs;
00570     }
00571     
00576     protected function getDisplayOptions()
00577     {
00578         $_sOptions = null;
00579         
00580         //  Look through options..
00581         foreach ( $this->makeOptions( true, PS::OF_ASSOC_ARRAY ) as $_sOptKey => $_sOptValue )
00582         {
00583             $_sOptions .= str_pad( $this->bold( '  --' . $_sOptKey ), 39, ' ', STR_PAD_RIGHT );
00584             if ( $_sOptValue ) $_sOptions .= 'Default value is "' . ( is_array( $_sOptValue ) ? implode( ', ', $_sOptValue ) : $_sOptValue ) . '"';
00585             $_sOptions .= PHP_EOL;
00586         }
00587         
00588         if ( $_sOptions ) $_sOptions = "MORE OPTIONS" . PHP_EOL . "$_sOptions" ;    
00589         
00590         return $_sOptions;
00591     }

00600     protected function getResultDisplay( $arFileList = array(), $bInclude = false, &$iNew = 0 )
00601     {
00602         $_iGen = 0;
00603         $_sMsg = PHP_EOL . "No files were created or destroyed." . PHP_EOL;
00604         
00605         foreach ( $arFileList as $_sFile => $_arParams )
00606         {
00607             if ( PS::o( $_arParams, '_status', 0 ) )
00608             {
00609                 $_sClasses .= $this->boldEchoString( '(' . $_arParams[ 'target' ] . ')', $_sFile, true );
00610                 $_iGen++;
00611             }
00612                 
00613             if ( $bInclude ) @include_once( $_arParams[ 'target' ] );
00614         }
00615         
00616         if ( $_iGen ) 
00617         {
00618             $_sMsg = PHP_EOL . 'The following file' . ( $_iGen > 1 ? 's were generated:' : ' was generated:' ) . PHP_EOL . PHP_EOL .
00619                 $this->echoString( '(File Name)', 'Class Name', true ) .
00620                 "============================================================" . PHP_EOL .
00621                 $_sClasses;
00622         }
00623         
00624         $iNew = $_iGen;
00625 
00626         return $_sMsg;
00627     }

00635     protected function displayParameters( $commandName, $arExtra = array() )
00636     {
00637         $_arOptions = array_merge( $arExtra, $this->makeOptions( true, PS::OF_ASSOC_ARRAY, true ) );
00638         $_iColWidth = $this->colWidth;
00639         
00640         //  Update column width based on option keys...
00641         foreach ( $_arOptions as $_sKey => $_sVal ) 
00642             $_iColWidth = max( $_iColWidth, strlen( $_sKey ) + self::COL_PADDING );
00643         
00644         $this->colWidth = $_iColWidth;
00645 
00646         echo PHP_EOL;
00647         echo $this->bold( "Pogostick Yii Extensions {$commandName} v" . self::VERSION ) . PHP_EOL;
00648         echo PHP_EOL;
00649 
00650         echo "Working Parameters" . PHP_EOL;
00651         echo "============================================================" . PHP_EOL . PHP_EOL;
00652 
00653         foreach ( $_arOptions as $_sKey => $_sValue )
00654         {
00655             if ( ! is_array( $_sValue ) )
00656                 echo $this->boldEchoString( $_sValue, $_sKey, true );
00657             else
00658             {
00659                 if ( count( $_sValue ) && is_array( current( $_sValue ) ) )
00660                 {
00661                     $_arOut = array();
00662                     
00663                     foreach ( $_sValue as $_sSubKey => $_sSubValue )
00664                         $_arOut[] = $_sSubKey;
00665 
00666                     $_sValue = $_arOut;
00667                 }
00668                 
00669                 echo $this->boldEchoString( implode( ', ', $_sValue ), $_sKey, true );              
00670             }
00671         }
00672                               
00673         echo PHP_EOL;
00674     }

00681     private function getBaseOptions()
00682     {
00683         return(
00684             array(
00685                 'force_' => 'bool:false',
00686                 'databaseName_' => 'string:db',
00687                 'basePath_' => 'string:' . Yii::getPathOfAlias( 'application.models' ),
00688                 'templatePath_' => 'string',
00689                 'templateName_' => 'string',
00690                 'baseClass_' => 'string:CPSModel',
00691                 'colWidth' => 'int:' . self::MIN_COL_WIDTH,
00692                 'schema' => 'object',
00693             )
00694         );
